CustomField.formula: IMAGE("https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=" + Street__c + "," + City__c + "," + State__c + "," + Country__c + "&zoom=13&size=600Ã—300&markers=color:red|" + Street__c + "," + City__c + "," + State__c + "," + Country__c + "&sensor=false" , "No map available", 300, 600)
CustomField.label: Google Map
